blogPost.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.
blogPost.body: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.
blogPost.title: Invoid - Enabling KYC automation & identity verification in India
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 想让真正的用户以最少的流失率入职？我们提供的服务包括身份验证(KYC)，以实现个人入职的自动化，并提升客户体验。我们设想创建一个可信的生态系统，身份是访问的关键。
localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

localize.description: 想讓真正的用戶以最少的流失率入職？我們提供的服務包括身份驗證(KYC)，以實現個人入職的自動化，並提升客戶體驗。我們設想創建一個可信的生態系統，身份是訪問的關鍵。
localize.tagline: 在印度實現KYC自動化和身份驗證。

previous.excerpt: Gladys Assistant is an open-source home automation software. It's easy to install on a Raspberry Pi, a NAS, or any machine running Linux.
